translation.en: Hello, everybody. Thanks for coming.
(CLEARS THROAT) I am the Lorax. I speak for the trees.
translation.zh: 我是老雷斯 我是树木的发言人

translation.en: And I'd like to say a few words, if you please.
translation.zh: 大家不介意的话 我想讲两句

translation.en: Regarding the story that you're about to see
translation.zh: 接下来大家看到的故事是真事

translation.en: it actually happened. Just take it from me.
translation.zh: 接下来大家看到的故事是真事 请相信我

translation.en: But there's more to this story than what's on the page,
translation.zh: 但故事内容远比节目单上的多

translation.en: so please pay attention while I set the stage.
translation.zh: 所以我布置舞台时 大家要注意了 故事发生在特尼镇

translation.en: We open in Thneedville, a city they say that was plastic and fake,
translation.zh: 故事发生在特尼镇 人们说这里全是塑料 是假的

translation.en: and they liked it that way!
A town without nature, not one living tree.
translation.zh: 没有大自然的小镇 一棵真正的树也没有

translation.en: So, what happened to them?
Cue the music! Let's see.
translation.zh: 音乐响起来 我们来慢慢看

translation.en: AUTOMATED VOICE: Buzz. Buzz.
(ALL SINGING) In Thneedville, it's a brand new dawn
translation.zh: 特尼镇 全新的一天

translation.en: With brand new cars and houses and lawns
Here in Got-all-that-we-need-ville
translation.zh: 有我们需要的一切的小镇

translation.en: In Thneedville, we manufacture our trees
translation.zh: 在特尼镇 树木是我们制造的

translation.en: Each one is made in factories
translation.zh: 每棵树都是在工厂生产的

translation.en: And uses 96 batteries
In Thneedville, the air's not so clean
translation.zh: 特尼镇 空气不太清新

translation.en: So we buy it fresh
translation.zh: 所以我们购买新鲜空气

translation.en: It comes out this machine!
In Satisfaction's- guaranteed-ville
In Thneedville, we don't want to know
translation.zh: 在特尼镇 我们不想知道

translation.en: Where the smog and trash and chemicals go
translation.zh: 烟雾垃圾和化学品去了哪里

translation.en: I just went swimming, and now I glow
translation.zh: 我去游泳 现在我会发光

translation.en: In Thneedville, we have fun year round
translation.zh: 在特尼镇 一年乐逍遥 既能滑雪又能冲浪

translation.en: We surf and snowboard right in town
We thank the Lord for all we've got
Including this brand new parking lot!
Parking lot!
Oh, look, it's Aloysius O'Hare
translation.zh: 看 那是欧海尔 欧海尔

translation.en: Aloysius O'Hare
The man who found a way to sell air
translation.zh: 他找到方法出售新鲜空气

translation.en: And became a zillionaire
Hip-hip-hooray!
In Thneedville, we love living this way
translation.zh: 在特尼镇 我们喜欢这样的生活

translation.en: It's like living in paradise
It's perfect! And that's how it will stay Oh, yeah!
translation.zh: 太完美 一切都不会改变

translation.en: Here in Love-the-life-we-lead-ville
translation.zh: 欧耶 热爱生活的小镇

translation.en: Destined-to-succeed-ville
We-are-all-agreed-ville
We love it here in...
Thneedville!
Yes!
Oh, hi, Ted.
Oh, hey, Audrey. Hi.
Did your ball land in my backyard again?
translation.zh: 你的球又落到了我家后院吗？

translation.en: What? No.
A model airplane, this time.
Hey, do you want to see something cool?
translation.zh: 你想见识下很酷的东西吗？

translation.en: Come on.
Did you...
Did you paint this?
Do you like it? What?
Are you kidding? This is amazing!
translation.zh: 那还用说 太了不起了

translation.en: What are those?
Those are trees. Real ones.
translation.zh: 这些是树 真正的树

translation.en: They used to grow all around here.
And people said that the touch of their tufts
translation.zh: 人们说毛毛树叶摸起来柔软无比

translation.en: was softer than anything, even silk.
And they smelled like butterfly milk!
Wow! What does that even mean?
I know, right?
Oh, yeah.
What I want more than anything in the whole world is to see
translation.zh: 在这世界上我最大的心愿就是看到

translation.en: a real living tree
growing in my backyard.
So if, say... I'm just thinking out loud here.
If a guy somehow got you one...
translation.zh: 如果一个男生帮你找到树

translation.en: I'd probably marry him on the spot.
translation.zh: 可能我立马就会嫁给他

translation.en: I bet that sounds crazy. Does that sound crazy?
translation.zh: 听起来很疯狂吧 疯狂吗？

translation.en: No! Not crazy. (CLEARS THROAT)
Not crazy at all.
Ted, honey, don't play with your food.
translation.zh: 泰德 亲爱的 食物不是用来玩的

translation.en: You, either, Mom.
So, Mom, do you happen to know if there's any place
translation.zh: 妈 你知不知道在哪个地方

translation.en: where I could get a real tree?
Ted, we already have a tree. It's the latest model.
translation.zh: 泰德 我们已经有树了 而且还是最新款的

translation.en: Yeah, but I mean a real one
translation.zh: 是的 但我说的是真正的树

translation.en: that grows out of the ground or whatever.
You know, a real tree.
Really?
You would rather have some dirty, messy
translation.zh: 你宁愿要地上突起的一块 又脏又乱的烂木头吗？

translation.en: lump of wood that just sticks out of the ground?
translation.zh: 又脏又乱的烂木头吗？ 它能做什么？

translation.en: And it does what? I don't even know what it does.
translation.zh: 我甚至不知道它能做什么？

translation.en: What's its purpose?
Look at what we've got.
It's the Oak-amatic. The only tree with its own remote.
translation.zh: 这是全自动橡树 唯一自带遥控的

translation.en: Summer, autumn, winter,
and disco!
Mom? Come on, Ted. Get into it.
Dance with the tree.
translation.zh: 来吧 泰德 投入点 随着树起舞吧

translation.en: Oh, it hurts, Mom. Please stop. (MUSIC STOPS)
translation.zh: 亮瞎眼了 妈 拜托停下

translation.en: So, anyway...
Let's just say I need a tree.
translation.zh: 这样说吧 我需要一棵树

translation.en: Where would I go? What do I do?
translation.zh: 到哪里去弄 我该怎么做？

translation.en: Then you know what? You need to find the Once-ler.
translation.zh: 知道吗 你需要找到老万

translation.en: (STAMMERS) The what?
translation.zh: 什么？ 妈 现在可不是

translation.en: Mom, it's not really the time for one of your magical fables, okay?
translation.zh: 妈 现在可不是 讲魔法故事的时候

translation.en: (LAUGHS) That's right, I forgot.
I'm old and can't even remember to put my teeth in.
translation.zh: 我老了 甚至不记得装上自己的牙齿

translation.en: Stand down. That's not what I meant.
translation.zh: 别掺和 我不是这个意思

translation.en: No, really, I forgot my teeth.
Would you be a dear and go get them for me?
(SIGHS) Sure, Mom.
Okay, here's the deal.
The Once-ler is the man who knows what happened to the trees.
translation.zh: 老万是知道树木发生了什么事的人

translation.en: You want one, you need to find him.
translation.zh: 你要树 就得找到他

translation.en: The Once-ler? Mmm-hmm.
Okay. Grammy, is this a real thing that we're talking about now?
translation.zh: 好吧 奶奶 真的有这个人吗？

translation.en: Oh, he's real all right.
Well, where can I find him?
Far outside of town where the grass never grows
translation.zh: 小镇外很远的地方 那里寸草不生 微风阵阵 酸臭不堪

translation.en: and the wind smells slow and sour when it blows.
translation.zh: 微风阵阵 酸臭不堪

translation.en: And no birds ever sing, excepting old crows.
translation.zh: 没有鸟儿唱歌 除了老乌鸦

translation.en: Quit doing that.
That's the place where the Once-ler lives.
Wait, outside of town?
People used to say if you brought him 15 cents,
translation.zh: 人们都说 如果你带给他1毛5分钱

translation.en: a nail
and the shell of a great, great, great grandfather snail,
translation.zh: 还有一个非常非常非常老的蜗牛的壳

translation.en: he would tell you everything.
Mr. O'Hare, what we've got for you
translation.zh: 欧海尔先生 为你准备的东西

translation.en: is something that is going to take O'Hare Air
translation.zh: 可以令欧海尔空气公司

translation.en: to the next level.
Now, Mr. O'Hare, I know what you're thinking.
translation.zh: 欧海尔先生 我知道你在想什么

translation.en: One, "I've gotten rich selling people air that's
translation.zh: 一 外面世界的空气恶臭无比

translation.en: "fresher than the stinky stuff outside."
translation.zh: 我把新鲜空气卖给大家发了财

translation.en: Two, and here is the important one,
translation.zh: 我把新鲜空气卖给大家发了财 二 这条很重要

translation.en: "How can I possibly make even more money?"
translation.zh: 我怎么可能赚得到更多的钱？

translation.en: We can tell you, sir! We can tell you.
translation.zh: 我们能告诉你 先生

translation.en: Check out this commercial, huh?
Well, here goes another lame Saturday.
translation.zh: 又是一个无聊的星期六

translation.en: Dude, I don't think so!
translation.zh: 哥们 我可不这样认为

translation.en: Man!
What!
COMMENTATOR: O'Hare purified air. Freshness to go.
translation.zh: 欧海尔净化空气 新鲜随时出发

translation.en: Please breathe responsibly.
Ah?
Oh, my goodness. Yeah! Love it.
translation.zh: 怎么样？ 老天 太喜欢了

translation.en: You got to be kidding me.
You really think people are stupid enough to buy this?
translation.zh: 你们真觉得人们会蠢到去买这个吗？

translation.en: Our research shows that if you put something in a plastic bottle,
translation.zh: 调查显示 把东西装在塑料瓶里

translation.en: people will buy it.
Exactly. And...
And what's more, when we build a new factory
translation.zh: 还有 我们建新工厂

translation.en: to make the plastic bottles,
the air quality is just going to get worse.
translation.zh: 空气质量就会变得更差

translation.en: Which will make people want our air even more,
translation.zh: 这将令人们更想买我们的空气

translation.en: and drive sales where?
translation.zh: 这将令人们更想买我们的空气 销量会怎么样呢？

translation.en: Through the roof!
So, in other words, the more smog in the sky,
translation.zh: 换句话说 天空中的烟雾越多

translation.en: the more people will buy.
See, that's why he's the genius! It even rhymes!
translation.zh: 瞧 所以说他是天才 说话还带押韵的

translation.en: I'm aware it rhymes.
What do you two knuckleheads want?
translation.zh: 你们两个笨蛋来做什么？

translation.en: I'm in the middle of a meeting!
What?
Why is he leaving town?
No one ever leaves town!
See what he's up to.
Oh, man.
All right.
Okay.
What the... Whoa!
Who are you?
Who are you and what are you doing here?
I'm Ted. I'm Ted.
I can't breathe. Are you the Once-ler?
translation.zh: 我喘不过气了 你是老万吗？

translation.en: Oh, man. Didn't you read the signs?
No one is supposed to come here.
Get out of here and leave me alone!
And don't let the boot hit you on the way out.
translation.zh: 离开时别让靴子踢到你

translation.en: The boot?
Hello!
Listen! People say that if someone brings you this stuff
translation.zh: 人们说如果给你带这些东西

translation.en: that you will tell them about trees.
No, no, no!
Trees?
Yeah, real ones.
translation.zh: 对 真正的树 就是从地上长出来的那种

translation.en: You know, that grow out of the ground?
translation.zh: 就是从地上长出来的那种

translation.en: Hello?
Sorry, it's just...
Well, I didn't think anyone still cared about trees.
translation.zh: 我没想到还有人关心树的事

translation.en: Well, that's me. The guy who still cares. I'm here.
translation.zh: 我还关心 我就在这里

translation.en: Hey! What?
Do you want to know about trees?
About what happened to them?
Why they're all gone? It's because of me.
translation.zh: 它们为什么全没了？全是因为我

translation.en: Wait, what?
It's because of me! (COUGHS)
And my invention, the Thneed.
translation.zh: 还有我的发明 特尼 是件了不起的产品

translation.en: It was an amazing product that could do the job of a thousand.
translation.zh: 是件了不起的产品 可以有上千种用法

translation.en: All right.
Sounds ridiculous, but I mean, that's cool.
translation.zh: 听起来挺可笑的 我说是 挺酷的啦

translation.en: You're darn right it was cool!
It all started a long time ago.
Can we start not so long ago, maybe?
Do you want a tree?
Yes, yes.
Then it all started a long, long time ago.
translation.zh: 那是很久很久以前的事…

translation.en: I was a young man leaving home.
translation.zh: 我很年轻 正准备离开家

translation.en: Well, here I go, Mom. Off to change the world with my Thneed.
translation.zh: 我走啦 妈 我要用我的特尼改变世界

translation.en: I'm actually doing it!
Yes, but just remember, Oncie,
translation.zh: 是的 但要记住 小万

translation.en: if somehow your invention ends up a failure
translation.zh: 如果说你的发明最终失败了

translation.en: instead of a success,
translation.zh: 如果说你的发明最终失败了 没有成功

translation.en: oh, it wouldn't surprise me at all! (ALL LAUGHING)
Nice wheels.
Burn!
Yeah, "Burn!"
But you will see, okay? I'm going to prove you all wrong.
translation.zh: 我们走着瞧 我会证明你们全错了

translation.en: Come on, Melvin!
So, there I was at the very bottom.
translation.zh: 那时候我非常落魄 全部家当只有一辆车 一头骡子

translation.en: With nothing but a wagon, a mule,
translation.zh: 全部家当只有一辆车 一头骡子 还有超级可笑的乐观

translation.en: and a completely irrational sense of optimism.
I was searching the globe,
obsessed with finding the perfect material for my Thneed.
translation.zh: 执着地想找到完美的材料做特尼

translation.en: But I'd had absolutely no success.
Until one day, I found paradise. (NEIGHS) Oh!
translation.zh: 直到有一天 我找到了天堂

translation.en: We're going to be there soon, I'm sure.
translation.zh: 我们马上就会到了 我保证…

translation.en: This is the most beautiful place,
okay, I have ever seen.
(SINGING) This is it
This is the place
These Truffula trees are just what I need
translation.zh: 这些毛毛树正是我需要的

translation.en: Gonna chop one down and make my Thneed
But first...
Now you!
That's great!
So now our friendship can begin
Hand in hand, and wing and fin
There's nothing you and I can't do
translation.zh: 没什么事是我们做不到的

translation.en: So let's all make my dreams come true
Hey, guys!
Come on, where is my back-up chorus?
translation.zh: 来嘛 我的合声团呢？

translation.en: What?
TED: Hey, hey, wait. Wait a minute.
Excuse me?
Yeah, that's awesome.
translation.zh: 给森林动物喂垃圾食物

translation.en: Feeding junk food to forest animals? That's great.
translation.zh: 真是太棒了 是挺不错的

translation.en: But, uh, is there a musical number
translation.zh: 但是 你告诉我怎么得到树时

translation.en: where you show me how to get a tree?
Because I would love to hear that one.
Oh, yes. Right after the musical number about the kid
translation.zh: 有 但先要来出音乐剧 讲一个孩子总是打扰别人讲故事

translation.en: who kept interrupting the story,
translation.zh: 讲一个孩子总是打扰别人讲故事

translation.en: and was never heard from again.
translation.zh: 从此他再也没出现过了

translation.en: Right, got it. Proceed.
All right, here we go.
About to make a Thneed, about to change the world.
Check it out, guys...
Where did everybody go?
Little did I know that by chopping down that tree
I had just summoned a mystical creature as old as time itself.
translation.zh: 就会召唤出一位神秘人 自有时间开始便有了他

translation.en: The legendary, slightly annoying
translation.zh: 传说中的 有点讨人厌的

translation.en: guardian of the forest.
The Lorax.
Did you chop down this tree?
Uh... No.
Who did it?
(GASPS) What's that?
I think he did it.
Leave! Vacate the premises!
Take your ax and get out!
And who are you?
I'm the Lorax! Guardian of the forest.
translation.zh: 我是老雷斯 森林的守护人

translation.en: I speak for the trees.
So you're telling me, you just didn't see me
translation.zh: 你意思是 你刚刚没有看见

translation.en: magically appear out of that stump?
translation.zh: 我神奇地从树桩中出现吗？

translation.en: With all the lightning and thunder and stuff.
translation.zh: 伴随着闪电打雷什么的？

translation.en: You didn't see any of that?
No, but that sounds amazing. Can I see some of that?
translation.zh: 没 但听起来太厉害了 能给我见识下吗？

translation.en: Uh, yeah, I could show you. But that's not how it works.
translation.zh: 我可以给你看 但其原理不是这样的

translation.en: Okay. Um...
Didn't really happen.
Oh, I know what you want!
I've got one of these for the cutest little guy I ever saw!
translation.zh: 我有这个 给我见过的最可爱的小人儿

translation.en: Yummy, yummy, yummy, yummy, yummy...
How dare you! Give me that!
I'm going to eat this,
but I am highly offended by it.
translation.zh: 但我觉得被深深冒犯了

translation.en: What are you... Hey, Mustache! Will you stop that?
translation.zh: 做什么？大胡子 你住手好吗？

translation.en: What's your deal, man?
translation.zh: 你想怎样 伙计？ 是时候走人了 瘦竹竿

translation.en: Time for you to go, Beanpole! Pull them right out.
translation.zh: 是时候走人了 瘦竹竿 你拉出来

translation.en: Just going to put them right back in. We can do this all day.
translation.zh: 我就会敲回去 我们可以闹一天

translation.en: Stop right there! Stop it!
So you would hammer one of nature's innocent creatures?
translation.zh: 你会敲打自然界 如此天真无辜的动物吗？

translation.en: What? No!
I would never hit this little guy. You, on the other hand,
translation.zh: 我永远不会打那个小家伙 你就不同了

translation.en: I would gladly pound you
and your mustache into the ground!
translation.zh: 还有你的胡子敲到地下去！

translation.en: Behold! The intruder and his violent ways.
translation.zh: 请看！入侵者和他的暴力行为

translation.en: Shame on you. For shame!
All right, you know what? That's it!
You listen to me, you furry meatloaf.
translation.zh: 给我听好 你这个毛茸茸的肉饼

translation.en: I'm going to chop down as many trees as I need. Okay?
translation.zh: 我需要多少就会砍多少棵

translation.en: Newsflash! Not going anywhere!
translation.zh: 懂了吗？ 说得很清楚了 我哪里也不去

translation.en: End of story.
Then you leave me no choice.
translation.zh: 那么你让我别无选择了

translation.en: If you're not gone by the time the sun sets on this valley,
translation.zh: 如果日落降临山谷时你还没走

translation.en: all the forces of nature will be unleashed upon you
translation.zh: 所有自然的力量都会来找你麻烦

translation.en: and curse you until the end of your days!
translation.zh: 诅咒你直到你生命的最后一刻！

translation.en: You have been warned.
Thanks. Yeah, okay.
You have been warned.
But I didn't listen to his warning.
And you won't believe what happened that night.
translation.zh: 你不会相信那晚发生了什么

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 你不会相信那晚发生了什么 什么？

translation.en: If you want to hear more, come back tomorrow.
translation.zh: 如果你还想听 就明天再来

translation.en: Hey, wait, wait! Tomorrow?
Are you serious right now?
Ah! You live in the middle of nowhere!
translation.zh: 你是说真的吗？ 你住在这荒郊野外

translation.en: It stinks out here. Don't make me come back!
translation.zh: 这里好臭 别让我再跑一趟

translation.en: I guess you don't really want to hear the rest of the story.
translation.zh: 看来你并不是真心想听后面的故事

translation.en: No, no.
I do. I really do. I want to hear the story. I just...
translation.zh: 我想 我真的想 我想听后面的故事 只是…

translation.en: Nah! You don't have what it takes. Goodbye.
translation.zh: 别说了 你没这个耐心 再见！

translation.en: Wait, wait! I have what it takes.
It's all right. It's okay, I'll come back.
translation.zh: 好的 没事 我会回来

translation.en: It's no problem.
translation.zh: 好的 没事 我会回来 没问题

translation.en: See, here I am, leaving. Walking away now.
translation.zh: 看我现在走了 正在离开

translation.en: I'll see you tomorrow.
Maybe. Just maybe.
(CHEERING)
What did you wish for, Audrey?
translation.zh: 你许了什么愿 奥德丽？

translation.en: Well, I would love to tell you,
but, sadly, according to the universal wish laws, I cannot.
translation.zh: 但很遗憾 根本宇宙许愿法 我不能说

translation.en: (CHUCKLES)
translation.zh: 根本宇宙许愿法 我不能说

translation.en: TED: I know what she wished for.
Was it, perhaps...
This?
Ted, you didn't.
Oh, no. I totally did.
Happy birthday, Audrey.
Kiss him! Kiss him!
MRS. WIGGINS: Ted.
Ted. Tedster. Huh!
translation.zh: 泰德 小泰泰 泰德

translation.en: You're kissing the cereal again, hon. What?
I just... I like this cereal.
translation.zh: 我只是太喜欢这个麦片了

translation.en: What one is this? Yeah!
translation.zh: 这是哪个牌子的？就是它！

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 这是哪个牌子的？就是它！ 好吧

translation.en: Well, I'll make sure to buy extra next time for you.
translation.zh: 下次我会帮你多买一些

translation.en: All right, cool. Hey, I got to run. I got to go do a thing.
translation.zh: 挺好的 我得走了 我有事

translation.en: So, I'll see you guys.
translation.zh: 挺好的 我得走了 我有事 回见了

translation.en: Whoa! Whoa! Whoa!
You're not going anywhere, young man.
translation.zh: 你哪里也别想去 年轻人

translation.en: (SIGHS) It's Sunday. You know what that means?
translation.zh: 今天是星期天 你知道这意味着什么？

translation.en: Family time, and we're all playing board games!
translation.zh: 家庭聚会时间 我们要玩桌游

translation.en: But...
translation.zh: 我们要玩桌游 但是

translation.en: Oh, man.
Mom, seriously, every turn?
translation.zh: 妈 您不是吧 每次都这样

translation.en: Hey, back off!
translation.zh: 妈 您不是吧 每次都这样 别烦我

translation.en: No. Okay! Family time is over.
It is now personal time. I'll be in my room.
translation.zh: 现在是个人时间 我回房间了

translation.en: Okay, dear. Have fun.
translation.zh: 好的 亲爱的 祝你愉快

translation.en: I knew I could break her. Go. Huh?
translation.zh: 我就知道我会让她崩溃

translation.en: Go see him!
Oh, yeah!
You rule! Thank you, Grammy.
translation.zh: 你太牛了 谢谢你 奶奶

translation.en: Hey! Ted, right?
Um, Mr. O'Hare?
So, I hear you have become interested in trees.
translation.zh: 我听说你变得对树有兴趣

translation.en: What's that all about?
Where did you hear that?
Teddy, there's not much that goes on in Thneedville
translation.zh: 小泰德 特尼镇发生的事

translation.en: that I don't know about.
translation.zh: 小泰德 特尼镇发生的事 我都知道

translation.en: Here's the deal, I make a living selling fresh air to people.
translation.zh: 是这样的 我靠卖新鲜空气赚钱

translation.en: Trees? They make it for free.
translation.zh: 树嘛 能免费产生新鲜空气

translation.en: So, when I hear people talking about them,
translation.zh: 所以我听到人们提起树

translation.en: I consider it kind of a threat to my business.
translation.zh: 我就认为是在抢我的生意

translation.en: I don't even know what you're talking about.
translation.zh: 我根本不知道你在说什么

translation.en: You listen to me, boy.
Don't go poking around in things you don't understand
translation.zh: 别去招惹你根本不懂的事

translation.en: or I'll be your worst nightmare.
translation.zh: 否则我将变成你最可怕的噩梦

translation.en: I'm Frankenstein's head on a spider's body!
translation.zh: 我长着科学怪人的脑袋 蜘蛛的身体

translation.en: Yeah, um...
Okay, my mom is expecting me. So, I'm just going to...
translation.zh: 我妈还等我吃饭呢 我撤了

translation.en: Of course, of course. Now, go back to your family game time.
translation.zh: 当然 回去继续玩家庭游戏吧

translation.en: Grandma just finished her turn.
Please. I have eyes everywhere.
translation.zh: 拜托 到处都有我的眼线

translation.en: You got a beautiful town here, Ted.
translation.zh: 泰德 你生活的小镇这么漂亮

translation.en: Lots of fun stuff to occupy your short attention span.
translation.zh: 许多好玩的东西 可以占据你的大条神经

translation.en: Why, I can't think of any reason
you would ever want to go outside of town again.
Ever.
translation.zh: 你会想再次离开小镇 永远不会

translation.en: Okay! Good talk. Really good talk.
translation.zh: 很好 谈得很愉快 非常愉快

translation.en: Oh, no.
Look out!
Hey, man? You know, you need to change that door bell.
translation.zh: 伙计 你得换个门铃

translation.en: Oh, you missed me. What?
You're already back. Clearly, you missed me a little. Right?
translation.zh: 你回来了 显然你有点想我了 对吗？

translation.en: No, I didn't. I'm just here to hear the end of the story.
translation.zh: 我没想 我只是回来听故事的结局

translation.en: Why are you so interested in trees anyway? Why aren't you like other kids,
translation.zh: 你为什么对树这么感兴趣？

translation.en: break dancing and wearing bell-bottoms,
translation.zh: 你为什么不像其他孩子那样 跳霹雳舞 穿喇叭裤

translation.en: and playing the Donkey Kongs?
translation.zh: 跳霹雳舞 穿喇叭裤 玩电子游戏？

translation.en: (LAUGHS) Yeah, right, right. I don't know.
Uh, I just thought it would be kind of cool to have one, you know?
translation.zh: 我只是觉得 拥有一棵树挺酷的

translation.en: Huh?
It's a girl, isn't it?
What? No!
Really? Because when a guy does something stupid once,
translation.zh: 是吗？因为一个男生做一次蠢事

translation.en: well, that's because he's a guy.
translation.zh: 是吗？因为一个男生做一次蠢事 那是因为他是男生

translation.en: But if he does the same stupid thing twice,
translation.zh: 但如果他做相同的蠢事两次

translation.en: it's usually to impress some girl.
translation.zh: 但如果他做相同的蠢事两次 通常是因为要取悦什么女生

translation.en: Hey, she is not some girl!
translation.zh: 她可不是什么普通女生

translation.en: She's a woman, in high school.
And she loves trees. And I'm going to get her one. Aw!
translation.zh: 她爱树 我要给她弄一棵

translation.en: How nice to see someone so undeterred by things like reality. Thank you.
translation.zh: 看到有人不被现实吓倒真是太好了

translation.en: All right, but where did we leave off?
translation.zh: 谢谢 上次说到哪里了？

translation.en: (BUZZING)
Now that's a Thneed.
Nothing unmanly about knitting. No, sir.
translation.zh: 谁说编织没有男子气概的

translation.en: Who taught you guys how to steal a bed?
translation.zh: 你们偷床的技术是谁教的？

translation.en: Okay, nice and easy.
Nice work, you guys. Couldn't have done it without you.
translation.zh: 各位 做得好 没有你们可不行

translation.en: You got to be kidding me. Can he swim?
translation.zh: 开什么玩笑 他会游泳吗？

translation.en: Of course he can't swim!
Hang on, Pipsqueak! I'm coming to get you!
translation.zh: 坚持住 小不点 我来救你

translation.en: Hey, you fishies! Stop that bed!
translation.zh: 鱼儿们 快让床停下

translation.en: Jump, jump!
Come on, get up there. Come on.
Go, go! A little bit more! A little bit more!
Now what?
Get up there.
Okay, Pipsqueak, give me your hand.
Come on, reach out for the Lorax.
translation.zh: 来吧 拉住老雷斯的手

translation.en: Bar-ba-loots.
(HUMMING)
Hey, Beanpole, wake up!
What's happening? Where am I?
Hey! We got trouble, and it's coming up fast!
translation.zh: 出什么事了？我在哪里？ 出事了 马上要出大事了！

translation.en: We're in a river!
Help is on the way!
translation.zh: 快做点什么！ 救援马上就到了！

translation.en: No, no!
(GRUNTING)
(EXHALING) Yuck!
Ah!
I was heading into the light,
and you pulled me right back and here I am!
translation.zh: 我朝着光芒走去了 你拉我回来 我又活了

translation.en: You saved my life!
translation.zh: 你拉我回来 我又活了 你救了我的命

translation.en: Yeah, I know. Well, no, it's not that big a deal.
translation.zh: 你救了我的命 我知道 没什么了不起的

translation.en: It is a big deal!
translation.zh: 我知道 没什么了不起的

translation.en: Look, I almost went over that waterfall! Wait...
translation.zh: 太了不起了 我差点就从瀑布上掉下去了 等等

translation.en: On my bed. How did my bed get in the river?
Uh... About that...
translation.zh: 我的床怎么到了河里？ 关于这个…

translation.en: Actually... I put your bed in the water.
translation.zh: 关于这个… 其实是 我把你的床扔进河里的

translation.en: I just wanted to calmly float you away.
translation.zh: 我并不想伤害你 我只希望你慢慢漂走

translation.en: Look, everyone here needs the trees
and you're chopping them down!
translation.zh: 这里所有人都需要树 但你要砍掉它们

translation.en: So, we've got a big problem.
translation.zh: 所以 我们有很大的麻烦

translation.en: I hereby swear that I will never chop down another tree.
translation.zh: 好吧 听我说 我在此发誓 我不会再砍掉一棵树

translation.en: I promise.
Thank you. But I'm going to keep my eye on you.
translation.zh: 谢谢 但我会盯着你的

translation.en: Good. Now, I've got a big day tomorrow
translation.zh: 谢谢 但我会盯着你的 好的 我明天会很忙

translation.en: so I'm going to get some sleep.
translation.zh: 好的 我明天会很忙

translation.en: Right after I find my bed. (ELECTRICITY CRACKLING)
Okay, what are you...
Question, what are they doing here?
And follow up, if I may, what are you doing here?
translation.zh: 刚才没说完 你在这里做什么？

translation.en: Well, after the incident last night,
translation.zh: 刚才没说完 你在这里做什么？ 昨晚意外发生之后

translation.en: we found one of your socks and came here to return it.
translation.zh: 昨晚意外发生之后 我们找到你的一只袜子

translation.en: But when we got here, you were asleep. What?
translation.zh: 我们是来还袜子的 -但我们来了后…-什么？

translation.en: Ew!
Exactly. And sleeping is the body's way
translation.zh: 恶心 正是 睡觉就是在用姿势

translation.en: of telling other people to go away.
translation.zh: 正是 睡觉就是在用姿势 告诉其他人赶快走开

translation.en: I know, but you looked so cozy.
translation.zh: 告诉其他人赶快走开 我知道 但你看上去睡得好舒服

translation.en: And it was cold outside, and we just fell asleep. No harm done.
translation.zh: 我知道 但你看上去睡得好舒服 而且外面好冷 我们就睡着了

translation.en: "No harm done"? "No harm done"? Okay.
translation.zh: 没啥坏处 没啥坏处？好吧

translation.en: Okay, I put my lips on those. Well, I used to, anyway.
(GRUNTING)
Did you just... In my bowl!
translation.zh: 恶心 你刚刚是不是 在我的碗里…？

translation.en: You don't even have a mustache.
translation.zh: 你要这个做什么？ 你连胡子都没有

translation.en: What? I thought we made a deal last night.
Yes, we did.
translation.zh: 什么？我们昨晚不是说好了吗？

translation.en: And I said I wouldn't chop down any more trees.
translation.zh: 是的 我说我不会再砍树了

translation.en: And I said I was going to keep an eye on you.
translation.zh: 我说我不会再砍树了 我说我会盯着你

translation.en: I'm starving. What's for breakfast?
translation.zh: 我说我会盯着你 我好饿 早餐吃什么？

translation.en: (GRUNTS)
You know what? I got work to do. Yeah.
translation.zh: 知道吗 我还有工作

translation.en: I got to go into town and sell my Thneed.
translation.zh: 知道吗 我还有工作 我得去镇上卖特尼

translation.en: (LAUGHS)
You chopped down one of my trees to make that piece of garbage?
Look at that...
"Garbage"? Oh, no. Oh, no! You do not get it.
translation.zh: 你瞧瞧 破烂？才不是 你不明白

translation.en: This is a revolutionary product
translation.zh: 破烂？才不是 你不明白 这是革命性的产品

translation.en: that will change the world as we know it.
It has a million uses!
translation.zh: 会改变我们现在的世界

translation.en: Look at this. It's a swimsuit!
translation.zh: 它有数不尽的用法 看 这是泳衣

translation.en: Mud tracked all over your floor by uninvited guests?
translation.zh: 不速之客弄的地板全是泥

translation.en: Well, the Thneed sure comes in handy for that!
translation.zh: 不速之客弄的地板全是泥 这时候特尼就派上用场啦

translation.en: But wait, there's more! Thanks to its all-natural microfibers,
the Thneed is super-absorbent!
translation.zh: 多亏它的纯自然超细纤维 特尼超强吸水

translation.en: It also works as a hat.
Go ahead, knock yourself out.
translation.zh: 当然了 你可能想先拧干 来吧 你自己拧

translation.en: Good to know.
translation.zh: 但没人会买这个 很高兴知道

translation.en: Well, fortunately, you are not the target market, weirdo.
translation.zh: 很高兴知道 遗憾的是 你不是目标客户 怪人

translation.en: You're bringing a guitar?
translation.zh: 你不是目标客户 怪人

translation.en: Oh, yeah. I got a little jingle.
translation.zh: 你还带吉他吗？ 对 我准备了广告歌

translation.en: I'm gonna blow some minds, gonna sell some Thneeds!
translation.zh: 对 我准备了广告歌 我要让人们惊艳 我要卖出特尼

translation.en: Yeah.
translation.zh: 我要让人们惊艳 我要卖出特尼

translation.en: (SINGING) Everybody needs a Thneed
A fine thing that all people...
translation.zh: 人人都需要特尼 精美的产品…

translation.en: MAN: Sit down, go on.
Unfortunately, I didn't sell it the first day.
translation.zh: 坐下 继续唱 不幸的是 第一天没卖出去

translation.en: The Thneed is good
translation.zh: 不幸的是 第一天没卖出去 特尼很好

translation.en: The Thneed is great...
Hey! (CHEERING)
Hey!
Or the third, or fourth, or fifth day.
Okay, that one hit the tender spot.
That's it! You know what?
I'm done with this thing.
translation.zh: 够了 知道吗 我受够这个东西了

translation.en: Aw.
My family was right. I quit!
translation.zh: 我的家人说得对 我放弃了

translation.en: Oh, my gosh! I totally want one.
translation.zh: 好美的帽子 我的天 我绝对想要一顶

translation.en: That thing makes me like you more.
translation.zh: 我的天 我绝对想要一顶 这东西令我更喜欢你

translation.en: (CHUCKLES)
Hey! Where's your Thneed, did you sell it?
translation.zh: 你的特尼呢 卖了吗？

translation.en: Hey. No, no. Didn't sell it.
translation.zh: 你的特尼呢 卖了吗？ 没 没卖出去

translation.en: Turns out, it's ahead of its time, I guess.
Hey, you gave it your best shot. Right? What more can you do?
translation.zh: 你已经努力了 对吗？ 你还能怎样？

translation.en: Come on, take a seat, we'll deal you in.
What are we playing?
I'm playing poker. He's playing Go Fish. And I think he's hungry.
translation.zh: 我在玩跑得快 他在玩斗地主 我想他饿了

translation.en: (SINGING) Pancake, the pancake
Who is up for ninths?
All right, pass them over.
Yeah, see? (RUMBLING)
What's going on?
Oh, no. That's a lot of people.
(SINGING) Everybody needs a Thneed
A fine thing that all people need
translation.zh: 所有人都需要的精美产品

translation.en: The Thneed is good The Thneed is great
translation.zh: 特尼很好 特尼很棒

translation.en: Let's hope we're not too late
It's a super trendy hat
It's a tightrope for an acrobat
A net for catching butterflies
A thing we use for exercise
Everybody needs a Thneed
A fine thing that all people need
translation.zh: 所有人都需要的精美产品

translation.en: Everybody needs a Thneed
Oh, yeah! We're in business, baby!
translation.zh: 太棒了 我们有生意做了

translation.en: We need a Thneed
Mom? Hey, it's me! I told you I was going to be a success!
translation.zh: 妈？是我 我跟你说过我会成功的

translation.en: You need to bring the whole family here right now.
translation.zh: 你现在就带着全家过来

translation.en: We're going to be rich!
What? I'm going to need all the help I can get. Don't worry.
translation.zh: 怎么啦？我需要尽量多的帮手 别担心

translation.en: GRAMMY: So, has he told you how to get a tree yet?
translation.zh: 他告诉你怎么弄到树了吗？

translation.en: Actually, no.
But I think he's going to get to that part really soon.
translation.zh: 但我想他会很快讲到这个部分

translation.en: Here we are. What?
I'll just be a minute.
Oh, wow. Hey, Audrey!
Oh, hi, Ted! What's up?
You know me, just cruising. Putting out the vibe.
translation.zh: 你知道我的 兜兜风 耍耍帅

translation.en: Just me and my thoughts.
Oh, is this the girl you're always talking about?
translation.zh: 她就是你总是说起的女生吗？

translation.en: Grandma! Stop making things up.
She's even prettier than... Okay, got to run! Bye.
translation.zh: 她比你说得更漂… 得走了 拜！

translation.en: Okay, Grammy, let's get you home!
(GRUNTS)
I'm so sorry. So sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起 真是对不起

translation.en: Did not wanna see that.
Hey, I'm back.
What have you got there?
Thank you, Ted.
Now, picture this.
Sun shining, a blue sky, a perfect day.
translation.zh: 阳光普照 天空湛蓝 完美的一天

translation.en: It was all downhill from there.
translation.zh: 自那以后情况就变糟了

translation.en: What a dump.
Hey, Aunt Grizelda!
Hey, Chet, check this out!
Go long!
No, Brett, that's actually not a...
Okay.
Go long! Go long!
I got it! I got it!
Got it!
He totally ran into that tree!
Oncie, is that you?
Mom!
There he is! There's my big, suddenly successful son!
translation.zh: 他在这里 我突然成功的了不起的儿子

translation.en: We always knew you would make it, Oncie. Right?
translation.zh: 我们一直知道你会成功的 小万 对吗？

translation.en: Hey! I love this guy!
translation.zh: 我爱这家伙 但你一直说我会一事无成

translation.en: But you always said I wouldn't amount to anything, remember?
translation.zh: 但你一直说我会一事无成 记得吗？

translation.en: Hush your mouth. I was just trying to motivate you!
translation.zh: 快闭嘴 我只是想激励你

translation.en: I am really glad that you clarified that
because it actually hurt my feelings for a really long time.
Anyway, you're all here, you all work for me, and that's cool.
translation.zh: 总之 你们都来了 都要为我工作 这样挺好的

translation.en: So, let's get to work.
Brett, Chet, set up the RV!
translation.zh: 布莱特！查特！ 把露营车布置好！

translation.en: Would you stop throwing that bear?
(PROTESTING)
translation.zh: 暂停 退后 住手 别动

translation.en: Time out. Back up. Stop. Don't move an inch. Nobody's moving in here.
translation.zh: 暂停 退后 住手 别动 没人能搬到这里

translation.en: You got to go. Goodbye.
So, who invited the giant, furry peanut?
translation.zh: 谁叫这个大毛花生来的？

translation.en: You calling me a peanut, huh?
I'll go right up your nose!
You wouldn't hit a woman.
That's a woman?
Okay. Everyone, cool it.
Let's not get off on the wrong foot here.
translation.zh: 别一开始就这么不友好嘛

translation.en: Um, family, this is my friend... Acquaintance.
translation.zh: 家人们 这是我的朋友 熟人

translation.en: Yeah, acquaintance. Very good acquaintance, the Lorax.
translation.zh: 熟人 很熟的人 老雷斯

translation.en: He speaks for the trees. That's right.
And on behalf of the trees, get out!
translation.zh: 代表树木我要说 离开这里

translation.en: Will you just be nice! This is my family.
translation.zh: 你友好点不行吗？这是我的家人

translation.en: And I'm going to need their help
translation.zh: 如果我的公司要发展的话

translation.en: if my company is going to get bigger. Okay?
translation.zh: 就需要他们的帮助 明白吗？

translation.en: Bigger?
Yeah, this isn't some rinky-dink operation anymore.
translation.zh: 对 这不再是什么破烂小公司了

translation.en: I got plans. Big plans!
translation.zh: 我有计划 大计划 我要让全世界到处都有特尼

translation.en: A vision of a world filled with Thneeds. It's going to be huge!
translation.zh: 我要让全世界到处都有特尼 会非常了不起的！

translation.en: Which way does a tree fall?
Uh, down?
A tree falls the way it leans.
Be careful which way you lean.
translation.zh: 要当心你倾斜到哪边了

translation.en: I mean, look at this. It's amazing.
translation.zh: 看这个 太了不起了

translation.en: I am so proud of me.
Oncie, we've got us a little problem.
translation.zh: 小万 我们有点小麻烦

translation.en: Problem?
Mmm-hmm.
See, we're not making Thneeds fast enough.
translation.zh: 我们做特尼的速度不够快

translation.en: Harvesting the tufts takes too long!
Well, what else can we do?
Well, and this just came to me,
we could always start chopping down the trees.
What?
translation.zh: 什么？ 这种想法才对嘛

translation.en: Now you're thinking. That would speed things up!
translation.zh: 这种想法才对嘛 这样可以加快速度

translation.en: But... No "but"s, Oncie.
translation.zh: -但是…-没有“但是” 小万 你现在是生意人

translation.en: You're running a business now.
You have to do what's best for the company,
translation.zh: 你一定要为公司的最大利益着想

translation.en: and your momma.
Well, I guess it couldn't hurt to chop down a few trees.
translation.zh: 砍掉一点树应该没多大坏处吧

translation.en: You've made me so proud, Oncie. Come here!
translation.zh: 我真为你骄傲 小万 过来

translation.en: Hey! I love this guy!
No! No, no, no! Stop it! Please, stop.
Take that, you stupid tree!
Where do you think you're going?
Excuse me, sir. I need to talk with your boss.
translation.zh: 不好意思 先生 我要和你的老板谈谈

translation.en: Oh, I'm sorry,
but Mr. Once-ler's not seeing anyone right now.
translation.zh: 但老万先生现在不见任何人

translation.en: Yeah, well, he'll see me. So...
Hey, keep your paws off me!
Give me a reason, Shorty.
translation.zh: 给我一个理由 矮子

translation.en: Hey, you broke your promise.
You're better than this.
You gotta stop! This is bad!
